Messages.cantRemove: You are not allowed to remove this
Messages.helpAdmin: /remove admin Optional:Time - To remove start removing anything
Messages.helpAll: /remove all Optional:Time - To remove start removing an entire building
Messages.helpRay: /rayremove - To remove the entire building that you are looking at
Messages.NoAccess: You don't have the permissions to use this command
Messages.noBuildingFound: Couldn't find any structure to remove
Messages.noFriend: You must be friend with the building owner
Messages.noToolCupboard: You need a Tool Cupboard to remove this
Messages.noToolCupboardAccess: You need access to all Tool Cupboards around you to do this
Messages.tooFar: You must get closer to remove this
